channel.title: seanreiser tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from seanreiser.

item.description: A local Popeye's has one of those Coca-Cola Freestyle machines. It was a little unusual because it didn't have a touchscreen, instead you join their WiFi network, scan the QR code with your phone... - https://t.co/iQohWGeMr5 via @seanreiser

@NancyLeeGrahn I'm of such mixed opinions here. I support making it easier for a person to vote, but I'm a technologist who spends a good deal of time thinking of man-in-the-middle attacks, I can easily see how drop boxes can be abused to intercept, change or discard votes.

I've been using dictation on my Mac more and more, saving my carpal tunnel ridden hands for coding. I was writing something about Star Trek: Strange New Worlds and I found it funny that no matter... - https://t.co/SPqLjrRYfZ via @seanreiser https://t.co/IEfldRMvA9

@jnettik It was a good talk. I have ppl around me that have health issues so I'm still not in a position to attend camps / cons yet. Since I can't be in a room with 100's of my DrupalFam, I'm going through sessions I couldn't attend in the past for professional growth.
@jnettik Just a quick thank you. I watched your session about #Drupal's Cacheing API from Drupaldelphia the other day over lunch.
